msg: fix the name of the shared library for libapr on AIX

to use a .so file instead of an archive

author: trawick
msg: get the new pools code to compile when !APR_HAS_THREADS

author: trawick
msg: AIX system header files define something called ALIGN(),
so prefix our two ALIGN macros with APR_

author: striker
msg: Actualize with respect to pools and sms.

author: striker
msg: Put new pools code in place which allows applications to
switch off locking on pools operations in case a pool is
guaranteed to never being used in more than one thread
at the same time.  We've seen a significant performance
Reviewed by:	Justin Erenkrantz, Brian Pane
